definition: The act of propelling oneself on a two-wheeled vehicle, typically with pedals, in order to travel from one place to another. It is commonly used as a means of transportation and recreational activity.

examples.german: Fahrradfahren ist eine umweltfreundliche Art der Fortbewegung.
examples.english: Cycling is an environmentally friendly means of transportation.

examples.german: Mein Bruder hat gestern Fahrrad fahren gelernt.
examples.english: My brother learned to ride a bike yesterday.

examples.german: Fahrradfahren ist eine beliebte Freizeitaktivität in Deutschland.
examples.english: Cycling is a popular leisure activity in Germany.

examples.german: Ich benutze mein Fahrrad täglich, um zur Arbeit zu fahren.
examples.english: I use my bicycle daily to commute to work.
